Traits.Name: Dwarven Toughness
Traits.Description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1 every time you level up

Traits.Name: Dwarven Resilience
Traits.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.
Traits.Name: Darkvision
Stonecunning
Traits.Description: Whenever you make an Investigation (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add *double* your proficiency bonus to the check.

Traits.Name: Cantrip
Traits.Description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spellcasting list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

Traits.Name: Mask of the Wild
Traits.Description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by any *natural* phenomena.

Traits.Name: Mask of the Wild
Traits.Description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by any *natural* phenomena.

Traits.Name: Superior Darkvision
Traits.Description: Your Darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

Traits.Name: Drow Magic
Traits.Description: You know the *dancing lights* cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the *faerie fire* spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the *darkness* spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.

Traits.Name: Fey Ancestry
Traits.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Traits.Name: Trance
Traits.Description: Your long rests take 4 hours instead of 8.

Traits.Name: Naturally Stealthy
Traits.Description: You can attem√ºt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

Traits.Name: Stout Resilience
Traits.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

Traits.Name: Brave
Traits.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Traits.Name: Halfling Nimbleness
Traits.Description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

Traits.Name: Lucky
Traits.Description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Traits.Name: Natural Illusionist
Traits.Description: You know the *minor illusion* cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

Traits.Name: Speak with Small Beasts
Traits.Description: You can communicate simple ideas with **Small** or smaller beasts.

Traits.Name: Artificer's Lore
Traits.Description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices, you can add *double* your proficiency bonus to the check.

Traits.Name: Tinker
Traits.Description: Using artisan's tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device [AC 5, 1 HP]. The device ceases to function after 24 hours [unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep the device functioning], or when

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.

Traits.Name: Gnome Cunning
Traits.Description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma savinge throws against magic.

Traits.Name: Fey Ancestry
Traits.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.

Traits.Name: Relentless Endurance
Traits.Description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

Traits.Name: Savage Attacks
Traits.Description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Within 60 feet: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light without colour.

Traits.Name: Hellish Resistance
Traits.Description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Traits.Name: Infernal Legacy
Traits.Description: You know the *thaumaturgy* cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the *hellish rebuke* spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the *darkness* spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
